title: Snap Posts Gains in Users, Revenue
text:
Snap Inc. reported another quarterly increase in users and revenue, signaling that changes made earlier this year to its social-media app and the launch of new tools for advertisers are helping its fortunes.

The Santa Monica, Calif., company said Tuesday the number of daily Snapchat users rose by seven million in the third quarter to 210 million, marking the third consecutive period of growth. description: Snap reported another quarterly increase in users and revenue, signaling that changes made earlier this year to its Snapchat messaging app are boosting its fortunes.
